name: .RPB File Extension
summary: Learn about .RPB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Phonebook file used by Radmin, a remote access program; contains connection information for multiple servers; may include local machines or computers accessed over the Internet.

content: The Radmin Phonebook file is named "radmin.rpb" by default and is located in the "\Documents and Settings\[userprofile]\Application Data\Radmin\" directory.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
